MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L8 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Pickwick Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:42PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the electrical cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:30AM on 27th February 2021.
